Articles.Content:
So, for awhile I've wanted Turbo Dismount. I don't own a credit card myself, and the person I go-to would always think of TD as too silly.

So, I had a dream that me and my Dad went to a Turbo dismount event, and he for some reason liked it and bought it. When I woke up, I realised it was a dream and was very sad. I went to my library- and to my suprise, TD was there! Along with a TD recipt and its Catridge. (round thing) but it was broken, the game was without gravity, only one map and car. I decided to try and contact Origin to get a new copy via the internet with my proof of purchase....

Then I wake up. For real now. DAMMIT.

Wish I could buy it for you, but I don't have a credit card and the guy who helped me buy KSP and TD among others got rid of his.

You know, you might be able to "obtain" it through some other methods, if you know what I mean, but I wouldn't suggest doing that. Instead, look for friends or family members with credit cards or a paypal account. That's what I did, and it worked for me.

Edit: And yes, Turbo Dismount is a fun game with lots of replay value. Definitely worth it. You can play the demo online too!

Edited July 31, 2014 by astropapi1

Wish I could buy it for you, but I don't have a credit card and the guy who helped me buy KSP and TD among others got rid of his.

You know, you might be able to "obtain" it through some other methods, if you know what I mean, but I wouldn't suggest doing that. Instead, look for friends or family members with credit cards or a paypal account. That's what I did, and it worked for me.

Edit: And yes, Turbo Dismount is a fun game with lots of replay value. Definitely worth it. You can play the demo online too!

Oh yes, I know of other sources, but they are terribly outdated, and don't have workshop. As for family and friends, pretty much Dad controls everything so it's gonna be pretty hard. As for friends, I have 1 that couldn't get it in the HB (he buys steam gift cards) but maybe if I would find some money I could pay him, idk really.
